column5: I am thinking of building a boat rack for my 12ft alum on my ford ranger.  Ill be using wood.  Does anybody have any pictures or Ideas as I could use some.  I have four holes on the top corners of my truck Box where I figure Ill put the up rights.  Thanks
I would suggest using Unistrut instead of wood, it's more durable/stronger than wood and easy to work with.
Should be able to find a used Cap somewhere? Way easier & a place to sleep!
